message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal, considering it's worth significantly more to you.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay up to $9,000 for the product.

Bob, I understand your position, but $9,000 is still too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit more, but I'm holding firm at $9,500.  It's a fair price considering the value you'll get from the product. Let's see if we can make this work.

Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I can only consider offers up to $8,500. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I understand your budget limitations, but $8,500 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to make one last compromise to make this deal work. Let's settle on $9,000.  It's a good price for both of us, and I'm confident you'll see the value in the product.
